text.div:
ResourceVersionPolicy

How the system supports versioning for a resource.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/versioning-policy defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
no-version No VersionId Support VersionId meta-property is not supported (server) or used (client).
versioned Versioned VersionId meta-property is supported (server) or used (client).
versioned-update VersionId tracked fully VersionId is must be correct for updates (server) or will be specified (If-match header) for updates (client).

name: ResourceVersionPolicy
description: How the system supports versioning for a resource.

concept.definition: VersionId meta-property is not supported (server) or used (client).
VersionId meta-property is supported (server) or used (client).
VersionId is must be correct for updates (server) or will be specified (If-match header) for updates (client).
